00088                 {
00089                         return _size;

00097                         return _elem_count;

00116                         return get(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, val_size);
00117                 }

00123                 char* get(char* key)

00125                         return get(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1);

00175                 /* hash element */
00176                 struct hash_elem_t {
00177                         /* ptr to the key */
00178                         char* key;
00179 
00180                         /* key size */
00181                         uint32 key_size;
00182 
00183                         /* related value (memcopied) */
00184                         char* value;
00185 
00186                         /* value size */
00187                         uint32 value_size;
00188 
00189                         /* related value (not memcopied) */
00190                         char* pvalue;
00191 
00192                         /* collision chain */
00193                         struct hash_elem_t* next;
00194 
00195                         /* empty marker */
00196                         bool empty;
00197 
00198                         /* collision chain length */
00199                         uint32 hit_count;
00200                 }
00201                 * _hte;
00202 
00203                 /* number of buckets */
00204                 uint32 _size;
00205 
00206                 /* number of elements */

00208
